title: Stocks Climb on Factory Data as Gold Selloff Eases: Markets Wrap
description: Wall Street kicked off February with gains in stocks as solid factory data bolstered optimism about Corporate America while losses in gold and silver moderated after Friday’s dramatic rout. Bond yields rose alongside the dollar. The crypto world rebounded, with Bitcoin jumping.

title: Strategy slides after bitcoin briefly dips below crypto firm's key breakeven level
description: Bitcoin fell as low as about $74,500 early Monday, dipping below Strategy's average purchase price of $76,052 per token.

title: Is Bitcoin About to Get Hit by a Polar Vortex?
description: Bitcoin (BTC) has been ensnared in a brutal crypto winter since soaring to a peak above $126,000 in early October. The flash crash that hit just a few days later triggered a downward spiral, erasing gains amid mounting economic pressures and regulatory scrutiny. Today, BTC trades below $77,500, marking a staggering 38% plunge from its […]The post Is Bitcoin About to Get Hit by a Polar Vortex? appeared first on Money Morning - We Make Investing Profitable.

title: Bitcoin slips below $80K amid crypto selloff

title: 2 Bitcoin ETFs to Avoid—and 1 to Watch in 2026
description: As crypto prices continue to lag, two spot ETFs are charging elevated expense ratios that aren’t justified by their performances, while one offers a bargain.

title: Ozow Announces New Crypto Payments Solution
description: Payment processing provider Ozow has the official integration of cryptocurrency as a primary payment solution on its platform. Powered by MoneyBadger, South Africa’s Bitcoin-centric payments technology provider, this new offering allows customers to pay directly from their crypto wallets, including Bitcoin Lightning and major exchange wallets such as Luno, VALR, and Binance, with instant settlement […]

title: Trump’s Pick for Fed Chair Points to Growing Bitcoin-Dollar Synthesis
description: Warsh's hawkish stance on Fed policy may have disappointed the crypto world, but he said Bitcoin was effectively gold for anyone under the age of 40.
